text: Fernando "Cobo" Pereira is a major in the military of São Tomé and Príncipe. He led a coup against the elected government of Fradique de Menezes on July 16, 2003. He gave up power a week later as part of an agreement.leaders hand power back to civilian president", IRIN, July 23, 2003. ==References== Category:Heads of state of São Tomé and Príncipe Category:Living people Category:1963 births Category:African military people
title: Fernando Pereira (major)
